channel.title: yumi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in yumi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: chillin with Travis and them
item.description: 17:39 Tuesday 30 April 2019 JST Today Lin and I drove to Travis and Yumi’s place to hang out with them and Sakura. Johan was already there and Deji came a bit later. Nice to see everyone again, though in some ways it’s like the tribe is getting smaller (and larger!) No BBQ today due to rain, but we made 手巻き with chicken, eggs, salad, and then ice cream at the end.

item.title: Apocrypha 17
item.description: 00:51 Saturday 22 September 2018 JST Saw Miyu briefly tonight at Apocrypha #17, a trip to remember. Met Sabrina who I thought was courageous for the story she told about her family. This was Isaac’s second event, and it went really well. Yumi told a story about a transformative experience she had, which sounded to me like it could be a mixed gender version of Mankind Project. Chelsea’s story also seemed courageous, regarding personal struggles while on vacation.

item.title: dream wearing shoes in public
item.description: 05:06 Monday 28 May 2018 JST Walking outside, I realized I was wearing hiking boots and was shocked that I was wearing them while walking around on vacation. I asked store owner if I could have a bag to put them in, but he said he could not give me one, but I could not understand the reason why. I walked further and found a place to put my boots in a locker so I did that and saw Yumi there who taking things out of her locker and she said I could put my shoes with her stuff with kinda the implication that her son would be able to wear them when he got older.

item.title: dream scheduling conflict
item.description: 04:49 Saturday 23 December 2017 -03 I had a schedule conflict that I detected a few days out, but didn't try to rectify until the day of the conflict. Nate wanted to have me join a late night adventure sneaking into a dark house that only I knew the layout to find some prize close to midnight. I was more interested in joining Lin to meet Travis and Yumi for a roadtrip that started at 11pm, but planned to meet in nearly the same location, an empty field next to the building that Nate and I were going to explore in the dark.

item.title: Yay Travis and Yumi are staying in Tokyo!
item.description: ##11:58 Thursday 06 November 2014 JST## Yay! Travis and Yumi are staying in Tokyo!
